courses.title: Managing Stress and Anxiety
courses.content: Learn effective strategies to manage stress and anxiety, including mindfulness techniques and stress-reduction exercises.

courses.title: Building Resilience
courses.content: Discover techniques to enhance your resilience and develop coping mechanisms to deal with life's challenges.

courses.title: Positive Psychology: The Science of Happiness
courses.content: Explore the principles of positive psychology and learn evidence-based strategies to cultivate happiness and well-being in your life.
